about_the_game:
Shoot, dodge and fly! Get ready for an exciting magical adventure! As a young witch from Mushroom Village, you must save your friends from the attack of an unknown creature. Race against time, use your magic and weapon skills to face challenges and protect your companions . Embark on this immersive shooter and feel the thrill of being a fearless witch!
Shoot a bunch of enemies, solve puzzles, fly for your life and defeat evil bosses! Give it a try!
